contentList.content: Understand the literal meaning of any spoken or written language that you hear or see.
Gain +[1] toward speech checks with creatures who speak a language you understand other than Common.
Understand the literal meaning of any spoken or written language and gain an additional +[1] toward speech checks.
Understand the literal meaning of any spoken or written language and gain an additional +[1] toward speech checks.
You speak Draconic, the language of dragons, kobolds, and dragonborn.
You speak Dwarvish, the language of the dwarves.
You speak Elvish, the language of the elves.
You speak Giant, the language of the giants and ogres.
You speak Gith, the language of the gith.
You speak Gnomish, the language of the gnomes.
You speak Goblin, the language of the goblins, hobgoblins, and bugbears.
You speak Halfling, the language of the halflings.
You speak Orc, the language of the orcs and half-orcs.
You speak Abyssal, the language of the demons.
You speak Celestial, the language of the celestials.
You speak Deep Speech, the language of the mind flayers and intellect devourers.
You speak Infernal, the language of the devils, fiends, cambions, and tieflings.
You speak Primordial, the language of the elementals and djinni.
You speak Sylvan, the language of creatures of the Feywild.
You speak Undercommon, the language of the Underdark.
You can speak Thieves' Cant, the secret language of rogues.
You speak Draconic, the language of dragons, kobolds, and dragonborn.
You speak Dwarvish, the language of the dwarves.
You speak Elvish, the language of the elves.
You speak Giant, the language of the giants and ogres.
You speak Gith, the language of the gith.
You speak Gnomish, the language of the gnomes.
You speak Goblin, the language of the goblins, hobgoblins, and bugbears.
You speak Halfling, the language of the halflings.
You speak Orc, the language of the orcs and half-orcs.
You speak Abyssal, the language of the demons.
You speak Celestial, the language of the celestials.
You speak Deep Speech, the language of the mind flayers and intellect devourers.
Infernal is the devilish language of the Nine Hells. Spoken primarily by devils, it has also been passed down to the Hells-touched races of tieflings and fiend pact-bound warlocks.
You speak Primordial, the language of the elementals and djinni.
You speak Sylvan, the language of creatures of the Feywild.
You speak Undercommon, the language of the Underdark.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> increases by 1 and you learn three languages of your choice.
You have studied languages and codes. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> increases by [1].
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Speech <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> directed at the target creature in their native tongue.
Infernal is the devilish language of the Nine Hells. Spoken primarily by devils, it has also been passed down to the Hells-touched races of tieflings and fiend pact-bound warlocks.
Infernal is the devilish language of the Nine Hells. Spoken primarily by devils, it has also been passed down to the Hells-touched races of tieflings and fiend pact-bound warlocks.

During your rogue training you learned thieves' cant, a secret mix of dialect, jargon, and code that allows you to hide messages in seemingly normal conversation. Only another creature that knows thieves' cant understands such messages. In addition, you understand a set of secret signs and symbols used to convey short, simple messages, such as whether an area is dangerous or the territory of a thieves' guild, whether loot is nearby, or whether the people in an area are easy marks or will provide a safe house for thieves on the run.
